name: Oprichniki Medic
desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a staff-like device and tasked with providing emergency medical support to their comrades in arms.
In truth, these medics have largely only taken crash-course training, and as such, their healing abilities are limited. In practice, they tend to adopt more efficient methods of supporting their allies â€” mixing in with the different units and charging at the enemy lines.
